com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.drm

Class VirtuosoDrmSessionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.drm.VirtuosoDrmSessionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.penthera.virtuososdk.drm.KeyFetcher.KeyResponseHandler
    public class VirtuosoDrmSessionManager extends java.lang.Object implements com.penthera.virtuososdk.drm.KeyFetcher.KeyResponseHandler
    Manages a DRM session, retrieving stored keys for offline viewing or retrieving keys whilst online.

    • Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VirtuosoDrmSessionManager 
      VirtuosoDrmSessionManager(Context context, java.util.UUID uuid, IAsset asset, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> optionalKeyRequestParameters, Looper playbackLooper, Handler eventHandler, VirtuosoDrmSessionManager.EventListener eventListener)
      Create a DrmSessionManager to be used during media playback.
      public VirtuosoDrmSessionManager(Context context, java.util.UUID uuid, IAsset asset, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> optionalKeyRequestParameters, Looper playbackLooper, Handler eventHandler, VirtuosoDrmSessionManager.EventListener eventListener) throws UnsupportedDrmException
      Create a DrmSessionManager to be used during media playback.
      Parameters:
      context - The context to be used by the manager.
      uuid - The UUID of the drm scheme currently only supports widevine UUIDS.WIDEVINE_UUID.
      asset - The IAsset that any license requests will be made for.
      optionalKeyRequestParameters - An optional map of parameters to pass as the last argument to MediaDrm#getKeyRequest(byte[], byte[], String, int, HashMap). May be null.
      playbackLooper - The looper associated with the media playback thread. When using ExoPlayerV2 this can be null.
      eventHandler - A handler to use when delivering events to eventListener. May be null if delivery of events is not required
      eventListener - A listener of events. May be null if delivery of events is not required.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedDrmException
      VirtuosoDrmSessionManager 
      VirtuosoDrmSessionManager(Context context, java.util.UUID uuid, java.lang.String remoteAssetId, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> optionalKeyRequestParameters, Looper playbackLooper, Handler eventHandler, VirtuosoDrmSessionManager.EventListener eventListener)
      Create a DrmSessionManager to be used during media playback.
      public VirtuosoDrmSessionManager(Context context, java.util.UUID uuid, java.lang.String remoteAssetId, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> optionalKeyRequestParameters, Looper playbackLooper, Handler eventHandler, VirtuosoDrmSessionManager.EventListener eventListener) throws UnsupportedDrmException
      Create a DrmSessionManager to be used during media playback. This Constructor should only be used if the Asset has nt been added to the SDK. That is; The asset is being streamed directly from your catalog.
      Parameters:
      context - The context to be used by the manager.
      uuid - The UUID of the drm scheme currently only supports widevine UUIDS.WIDEVINE_UUID.
      remoteAssetId - The Id of the asset as set by you during creation of an IAsset (The id of the asset in your catalog).
      optionalKeyRequestParameters - An optional map of parameters to pass as the last argument to MediaDrm#getKeyRequest(byte[], byte[], String, int, HashMap). May be null.
      playbackLooper - The looper associated with the media playback thread. When using ExoPlayerV2 this can be null.
      eventHandler - A handler to use when delivering events to eventListener. May be null if delivery of events is not required
      eventListener - A listener of events. May be null if delivery of events is not required.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedDrmException

      onKeyResponse 
      void onKeyResponse(java.lang.String cache_id, byte[] key, java.lang.Exception error)
      Called when the KeyFetcher completes.
      public void onKeyResponse(java.lang.String cache_id, byte[] key, java.lang.Exception error)
      Description copied from interface: com.penthera.virtuososdk.drm.KeyFetcher.KeyResponseHandler
      Called when the KeyFetcher completes. On success the keysetId is passed back in the key parameter. On failure the key will be null and the error parameter will detail the Exception.
      Specified by:
      onKeyResponse in interface com.penthera.virtuososdk.drm.KeyFetcher.KeyResponseHandler
      Parameters:
      cache_id - On Success the id to use in the cache. null on failure or if license can not be persisted.
      key - On Success the keysetId of the key in MediaDrm. null on failure.
      error - On Failure the Exception. On Success it will be null.
      onProvisioned

      public void onProvisioned()
